title: Library Meeting Room Reservation Update
content:
Dear Library Users,

We would like to inform you about an update to our meeting room reservation system, which will take effect beginning next Monday. Due to increased demand for study and collaboration spaces, the library has adopted a new online booking platform designed to make the reservation process faster and more convenient.

To reserve a room, please visit the library website and select the “Room Booking” tab. You may choose from small, medium, or large rooms depending on availability. After completing the reservation form, you will receive a confirmation email that includes your reservation number and room details.

Please note that meeting rooms may be reserved for a maximum of two hours per day per user. If you arrive more than ten minutes late, the room may be released to other users. Additionally, rooms should be kept tidy, and users are required to remove any personal belongings before leaving.

For group reservations of more than six people, please contact the library staff directly at library-support@cityuniv.com. They will assist you with special arrangements and answer any questions about the new system.

Thank you for your cooperation as we work to improve our library services.

A reminder phone call from staff
